com.id AS com_id, com.nickname AS com_nickname, coma.id AS coma_id, coma.nickname AS coma_nickname FROM tb_comment co LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_member com ON co.member_idx = com.member_idx LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_manager coma ON co.manager_idx = coma.manager_idx WHERE post_idx = #{postIdx}
